name: Montepio Geral - Associação Mutualista
goal:
As mutual benefit association MGAM provides in the benefit of its members and their families, social security measures, such as retirement pensions, protection against the risk of life and invalidity, savings schemes, guaranties on behalf of its members in case of housing credits or credits granted to finance medical treatments, and, in some cases, scholarships.
Presently, MGAM is developing new capacities in the field of health care, building a network of health assistance to its members.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro
euInitiatives:
We are members of the following entities and we are deeply concerned with their activities:
• Internacional Assotiation for Mutual Benefit Societies, member, where is holding a mandate in the Board for 2017 - 2020 - https://www.aim-mutual.org/
• IPSE – Institut de la Protection Sociale Européenne – member, https://www.euroipse.org/ ;
• CIRIEC – Internationale – member, http://www.ciriec.uliege.be/;
